Name: Custom filtering behavior
Description:
This example demonstrates how to create custom filtering behavior for the ComboBox. 
Typing numbers in the ComboBox filters the items lenght. For example type 12.
KeyWords: Custom filtering behavior, filter, customization, match

Name: DropDown with AddNewItem button
Description: This example demonstrates how to display AddNewItem button inside dropdown of an editable ComboBox. If the user enters a value that is not available in the dropdown list, he could add it to the Items collection through this button.
KeyWords: DropDown with AddNewItem button, button, editable, combobox, template

Name: Drop down with headers
Description:
This example demonstrates how to display the items in the ComboBox drop down with headers. 
The approach uses a GridView inside of the Editable and NonEditable Templates.
KeyWords: Drop down with headers, gridview, drop, down, editable, noneditable, combobox

Name: How to display more than 1 property in editable mode

ExampleInfo.Name: How to display more than 1 property in editable mode

Description: This example demonstrates how to display more than one property in the TextBox of an editable ComboBox. Only one of them, bound to the DisplayMemberPath property, will be editable, all others will be read-only, in the example they are marked with different color.
KeyWords: How to display more than 1 property in editable mode, textboxstyle, customization
